# Hull-Mounted Thermistor (SBE 56)

## Overview

The SBE 56 is a high-accuracy thermistor providing precise temperature measurements at 0.5m depth, complementing the CTD temperature data.

## Key Features

- **Manufacturer**: Sea-Bird Scientific
- **Model**: SBE 56
- **Type**: Thermistor
- **Deployment**: Hull-mounted at 0.5m depth

## Measured Variables

- Temperature at 0.5m depth (TEMP_DEPTH_HALFMETER)

## Specifications

| Parameter | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| Temperature Range | -5 to +35°C |
| Accuracy | ±0.002°C |
| Resolution | 0.0001°C |
| Response Time | 0.6 s |

## Links

- [Manufacturer Product Page](https://www.seabird.com/sbe-56-temperature-sensor/product?id=60762467729)
- [Sea-Bird Scientific](https://www.seabird.com/)

## Deployment Notes

Mounted on the hull at 0.5m depth to provide high-resolution temperature data. The fast response time and exceptional accuracy make this sensor ideal for detecting fine-scale temperature variations in the upper ocean.
